./Giveaways

./ giveaway_rules.sh

$ cat overall_rules.txt

Overall Giveaway Rules

  • A Cybersecurity Sacramento & DC916 member may only win one item every other month to allow others a chance to win.
  • Only Cybersecurity Sacramento & DC916 members may enter. To enter please join our Discord and join the meeting during the drawing.
  • Cybersecurity Sacramento & DC916 member must be present for drawing to win.

$ cat virtual_items.txt

Virtual Item Giveaway Rules

Anyone who is a member of Cybersecurity Sacramento & DC916 may enter.

Examples: Software Licenses Online Courses Digital Books Cloud Credits

$ cat physical_items.txt

Physical Item Giveaway Rules

Physical items must be picked up at the physical meeting when the member's name is drawn or the meeting following after. Therefore, only members within the Sacramento area may enter for the Physical Item Giveaways.

If a member is unable to make it to the meetings for any kind of special circumstance but is still in the area, they may enter. Leadership will work with the winner on getting the winner their item.

Examples: Hardware Books Swag Tools

Giveaway FAQ

How are winners selected?
Winners are randomly selected during our monthly meetings using a fair and transparent process. All eligible members present at the meeting have an equal chance of winning.
What happens if I win but can't attend the next meeting?
For physical items, you must arrange pickup with Leadership within a reasonable timeframe. If you're unable to pick up your prize after two consecutive meetings, it may be returned to the prize pool for future giveaways.
How do I know what items will be given away?
Giveaway items are typically announced in our Discord server and during meetings. Join our Discord to stay updated on upcoming giveaways.

Next Giveaway

We will announce when our next giveaway is in our Discord and social media first!

Join our Discord for details on what items will be available!
